EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_ENG_6_CS_Video
EmailTemplate.subject: Find out how secure service enablement delivers performance and reliability
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Watch how Nokia has transformed CSP networks Network engineers are tasked with delivering the highest possible performance and reliability on a limited set of resources. Our clients are using Secure Service Enablement, including SBC, DRA and AAA, to make this happen.
Let us show you. Click on the link below to view the following case studies:
- Tier 3 operator secures and scales VoLTE infrastructure with Nokia SSE - Converged operator increases capacity, enables new services with Nokia SBC - Mobile operator offers new IMS services, grows revenue streams with Nokia CSD - Converged operator consolidates IP services to Nokia AAA Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
